name: @jumpstudios/table-util
description: A collection of utility functions for manipulating tables
author: Icejiynn

scripts.release:major: for /f %i in ('npx semver %npm_package_version% -i major') do npm version %i && npm publish --tag latest
scripts.release:minor: for /f %i in ('npx semver %npm_package_version% -i minor') do npm version %i && npm publish --tag latest
scripts.release:patch: for /f %i in ('npx semver %npm_package_version% -i patch') do npm version %i && npm publish --tag latest
